fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Education and training, Energy, Business and Industry, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services, Fraud prevention
industry_forums: ECSO has been invited to public hearings organised by the EPP and ITRE committee to present and discuss the ambitions of the cPPP and ECSO from an industry point of view
eu_initiatives: ECSO is the contractual counterpart to the European Commission for the implementation of the European Public-Private Partnership on cybersecurity.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
position: Head of Communications and Advisor to the Secretary General
relevant_communication: Signature with the European Commicion on 5th July 2016 of a CPPP in a Roundtable at European Parliament in Strasbourg. Regular High Level Roundtable will take place in the futur to discuss and disseminate the activities of ECSO and of the CPPP.
